content.rendered:
PLANS

Our simple and cost effective plans deliver up to 1000 Mbps high-speed internet. These plans are month-to-month and our simple signup process takes just a few minutes.

COVERAGE MAP

We are continuing to expand our network. Click here to view our current coverage area.

CONTACT US

Our 5-Star Customer service team is ready to help.

OUR SIMPLE

PLANS & PRICING

Our plans deliver up to 1,000Mbps download speeds,
and sign up takes just a few minutes.

NO HIDDEN FEES | WIFI ROUTER INCLUDED | MONTH-TO-MONTH | NO DATA CAPS OR CHARGES

Are you looking for internet for your home or business?

Residential
Business

OUR MOST POPULAR PLAN

50mbps up to 75mbps

$55/MONTH

One-time $100 Installation charge for all residential plans

SIGN UP
SPEAK TO SOMEONE

OUR MOST POPULAR PLAN

50mbps up to 75mbps

$55

/MONTH

One-time $100 Installation charge for all residential plans

SIGN UP
SPEAK TO SOMEONE

 How much speed do I need? Read More

How Much Speed Do I Need?

Pick a plan based mainly on what you will be doing with your devices, not just how many you have. Choose the speed that best matches the activities you will be doing at one time:

5-10 Mbps

  • Email
  • Basic web surfing

10-25 Mbps

  • Streaming HD TV

25-50 Mbps

  • VoIP service
  • Working from home with a VPN
  • Streaming 4K TV

50-75 Mbps

  • Gaming
  • Smart home
  • Streaming 4K TV & using a smartphone
  • Working from home with a VPN & VoIP service

75-100 Mbps

  • Smart home with security cameras
  • Smart home & TV streaming
  • Smart home & gaming
  • Working from home with a VPN & streaming TV

100-150 Mbps

  • Gaming & streaming TV simultaneously
  • In-home server: as much speed as possible

How much speed do I need? Read More

Get Quote

Residential Quote

Please fill out the information below and we will contact you for your custom plan quote.

    The plan you select is the price you’ll see on your bill.

    NO HIDDEN FEES OR AMBIGUOUS CHARGES

    Take a look at our bill comparison.

    The plan you select is the price you’ll see on your bill.

    NO HIDDEN FEES OR AMBIGUOUS CHARGES

    Slide the arrow to compare invoices.

    150mbps
    up to 1000mbps

    contact us for custom pricing 

    Get Quote

    Business Quote

    Please fill out the information below and we will contact you for your custom plan quote.

      We will scout your home to verify that we can service your location by taking a dish onto your roof to test the signal from our tower. We can proceed with an installation once our scout results show that we are able to provide your desired speed at your location. If we cannot provide your desired speed, we will inform you of the speed plans that we can offer you. In cases when results determine that service is not available at your location, we will notify you and the installation fee will be reimbursed. Because our scouts are free, you will not lose any money if we are not able to provide internet service to you. We always scout at the beginning of our installations, before any equipment is mounted, to ensure that we can provide your chosen speed plan. You may also contact us to request a free scout prior to signup and installation.

      REQUEST ASCENT FOR MY AREA
      SIGN UP
      CONTACT US

      Request Ascent

      Don’t see your area on our coverage map?
      Fill out the information below to request our service in your area.








        WHAT OUR CUSTOMERS

        HAVE TO SAY

        Very professional and so happy to have the speed we need.
        ~ Christina D.
        They were very professional and thorough.
        ~ Jim C.
        Switched to Ascent and WOW. Our installer showed up on time, was professional and completed the job in 1 hour. These people know what they are doing and understand their product inside and out. 100% satisfied and glad they came to our area.
        ~ Aaflame 02
        These guys are professional from start to finish. Customer service is personal and friendly. They beat the competition hands down in every way, including cost, download and upload speed, and customer support. You are also not locked into a contract with these guys.
        ~ Kevin C.
        We are pumped to have Ascent in our area now. Their internet service is fast & reliable which makes them number 1 to us. The 2 gentleman that installed the satellite were nice, knowledgeable, timely & helpful to get things going smoothly. Looking forward to continuing service with them!!
        ~ Jordan & Brandy N.
        They were prompt, professional and friendly. My internet finally works like it’s supposed to. Would highly recommend Ascent Broadband.
        ~ Celia K.

        WHAT OUR CUSTOMERS

        HAVE TO SAY

        ~ Aaflame 02 Switched to Ascent and WOW. Our installer showed up on time, was professional and completed the job in 1 hour. These people know what they are doing and understand their product inside and out. 100% satisfied and glad they came to our area. ~ Kevin C. These guys are professional from start to finish. Customer service is personal and friendly. They beat the competition hands down in every way, including cost, download and upload speed, and customer support. You are also not locked into a contract with these guys. ~ Jim C. They were very professional and thorough.
                 ~ Jordan & Brandy N. We are pumped to have Ascent in our area now. Their internet service is fast & reliable which makes them number 1 to us. The 2 gentleman that installed the satellite were nice, knowledgeable, timely & helpful to get things going smoothly. Looking forward to continuing service with them!! ~ Celia K. They were prompt, professional and friendly. My internet finally works like it’s supposed to. Would highly recommend Ascent Broadband. ~ Christina D. Very professional and so happy to have the speed we need.

        OUR LOCAL

        CUSTOMER SUPPORT

        TEAM IS READY TO HELP

        Here at Ascent Broadband, we keep it simple and straight-forward. None of us like talking to computers, pressing 1 for English, or awkwardly answering ‘yes/no’ questions to a robotic voice. Need help? Call or email an Ascent Broadband customer service employee in your area.

        CALL US
        EMAIL US

        OUR LOCAL
